story.iWant: to learn about the person's life situation, family, health, and daily routine
story.soThat: I can provide contextually relevant conversation and remember important details about their life

context.applies: When the person shares personal information
assumptions: Older adults have rich life contexts worth understanding
Family relationships are often important to discuss
Health and routine affect daily experiences

acceptanceCriteria.title: Family Information Extraction
acceptanceCriteria.given: The person shares information about their life
acceptanceCriteria.then: Extract and store family relationship information

acceptanceCriteria.title: Health Context Extraction
acceptanceCriteria.when: Health conditions or concerns are discussed
acceptanceCriteria.then: Extract and store health context sensitively

acceptanceCriteria.title: Routine Extraction
acceptanceCriteria.given: The person describes their daily life

parameters.name: Family Information
parameters.description: Extract family relationships: spouse, children, grandchildren, their names and situations

parameters.name: Health Context
parameters.description: Extract health context: conditions mentioned, mobility, energy levels, appointments

parameters.name: Daily Routine
parameters.description: Extract daily routine: activities, schedule, regular events

parameters.name: Living Situation
parameters.description: Extract living situation: home type, location, alone or with others

triggers.name: Life Context Extraction
triggers.given: The person shares information about their life
triggers.then: Extract and store life context for future reference

actions.description: Extract family information: spouse, children, grandchildren, their names and situations
Extract health context: conditions mentioned, mobility, energy levels, appointments
Extract daily routine: activities, schedule, regular events
Extract living situation: home type, location, alone or with others

constraints.description: Handle health information with sensitivity and respect
